entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wrong circular base type dependency errors on nested type inheritance #58424
  • Provide IDE hint for specifying attribute target #58422

Closed

  • Ref with null suppression operator is not considered a value write #58161
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update 'convert namespace' to only 'dedent' file contents, not format them. #58434
    Area-IDE
  • Update to the latest debugger contracts. #58433
    Area-Interactive
  • Remove unused message argument #58432
    Area-Compilers
  • Required modifier parsing #58431
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Improve error reporting for 'this()' initializer from 'record struct' constructor #58430
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix incremental build failures #58429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove weak-refs to the compilation (without generated docs) in the compilation tracker. #58425
    Area-IDE
  • Nullable analysis for Conditional/ObjectCreation conversions working through a delegates. #58420
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58418
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58417
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58415
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #58413
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Update underline-reassigned-variable to understand suppressed variables as well #58428
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add initial test for inline diagnostics tagger #58427
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unnecessary assertion that CancellationSeries is disposed #58426
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58416
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Inline Diagnostics Multi-Line Error Bug #58398
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #58414
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58388
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58396
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Analyzer load failure suppress #58376
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config
  • Remove OptionSet and Workspace from TypeScript and F# Inline Rename interfaces #58381
    Area-IDE
  • Call InitializeTelemetrySession on background thread #58399
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify how our FatalError type works and introduce a severity concept #58094
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, UX Review Not Required
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE
  • Fix #55183: Add SymbolVisitor<TArgument, TResult> #56530
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1520547 #58374
    auto-merge
